synopsis.text: Years after the events of Megazone saga, the remnants of humanity reside in the seemingly utopian Eden City, where life is governed by the System and social status is determined by programming skills and virtual gaming prowess. Enter Eiji Takanaka, a top-tier gamer and B-level hacker, who lands a job at E=X Corp, the enigmatic organization that oversees Eden. But before he can even begin his first day, Eiji finds himself entangled in a perilous digital warfare, haunted by visions of an elusive AI entity known as EVE. As he navigates this treacherous landscape, Eiji must unravel the secrets buried beneath Eden City and the ruins of the old Megazone, while confronting a plot that could reshape the future of Earth itself.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
